ResumeParserData.Experience: HSBC Bank Associate Director of Investment Banking  Manchester, UK  2018 - Present  Leading a team of analysts, managing M&A transactions, and providing strategic financial advice to clients. Responsible for conducting due diligence, financial modelling, and negotiating deal terms. Successfully enhanced client satisfaction and contributed to business growth. Key Achievements :   Managed a �300 million acquisition of a fintech company.  Improved team productivity by implementing advanced financial modelling tools.  Increased client portfolio value by 25% through strategic advisory.  Recognized for exceptional client relationship management and leadership skills.  Barclays Capital Investment Banking Associate  Manchester, UK  2015 - 2018  Supported senior bankers in managing client relationships, conducting financial analyses, and executing complex financial transactions. Played a key role in the successful execution of several high-value transactions.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducted detailed financial modelling and valuations for M&A transactions.  Assisted in negotiating deal terms and facilitating successful transaction closures.  Prepared financial reports and presentations for client meetings.  Mentored junior analysts, improving their financial analysis skills.  Lloyds Banking Group Investment Banking Analyst  Manchester, UK  2013 - 2015  Gained hands-on experience in financial modelling, market research, and transaction execution. Supported senior bankers in managing client relationships and executing complex financial transactions.  Key Contributions :   Assisted in the execution of several high-profile M&A transactions.  Conducted market research and financial analysis to support transaction decisions.  Prepared financial models and valuation reports for client presentations.  Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

JobProfile.Title: Associate Director of Investment Banking
JobProfile.Alias: director of associate, assoc. director, director associate

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading a team of analysts, managing M&A transactions, and providing strategic financial advice to clients. Responsible for conducting due diligence, financial modelling, and negotiating deal terms. Successfully enhanced client satisfaction and contributed to business growth. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Managed a �300 million acquisition of a fintech company. 
 Improved team productivity by implementing advanced financial modelling tools. 
 Increased client portfolio value by 25% through strategic advisory. 
 Recognized for exceptional client relationship management and leadership skills.

JobProfile.Title: Associate
JobProfile.Alias: director of associate, assoc. director, director associate

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Supported senior bankers in managing client relationships, conducting financial analyses, and executing complex financial transactions. Played a key role in the successful execution of several high-value transactions. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducted detailed financial modelling and valuations for M&A transactions. 
 Assisted in negotiating deal terms and facilitating successful transaction closures. 
 Prepared financial reports and presentations for client meetings. 
 Mentored junior analysts, improving their financial analysis skills.

JobProfile.Title: Investment Banking Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: ibd-analyst, incoming investment banking analyst, analyst of ibd, analyst ibd, fall investment banking analyst, investment banking analyst

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Gained hands-on experience in financial modelling, market research, and transaction execution. Supported senior bankers in managing client relationships and executing complex financial transactions. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Assisted in the execution of several high-profile M&A transactions. 
 Conducted market research and financial analysis to support transaction decisions. 
 Prepared financial models and valuation reports for client presentations. 
 Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Dedicated and results-driven Investment Banker with 9 years of experience in financial analysis, mergers and acquisitions, and corporate finance. Demonstrates strong analytical skills, client relationship management, and a commitment to providing strategic financial solutions. Proven track record in executing high-value transactions and driving business growth.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Emma has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Investment Banking and Securities Dealing. 'The candidate has a total experience of 9 YearsThe candidate has been working as a Associate Director of Investment Banking at HSBC Bank for the last 6.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Emma holds a High Management Level position, as Associate Director of Investment Banking at HSBC Bank. from 01/01/2018 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 6.7 years in this company.
